room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Baltimore in Baltimore
review: A lot of fun and the staff there is fantastic. I was surprised how much fun it was and how fast it went. The Game Master was great, everyone just really helpful and nice. I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a fun experience. We did the Kidnapping and needed a few clues to get it done. Weâ€™ll be back to try others.

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Baltimore in Baltimore
review: I really had a great time. Took my boyfriend for his bday on Feb 15th. We have never done an escape room before. The staff was really really nice and informative. We did the kidnapping room. I have anxiety issues so I was nervous about being blindfolded and handcuffed but I was a trooper and went along with it. That hour went by sooo fast and you get a rush from each code you crack. Unfortunately, we didn't escape on time. The staff member came in to show us what we didn't accomplish. A great experience.

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Baltimore in Baltimore
review: We went on a whim for my birthday, having never done one of these before. It was a great time! The staff is amazing and lovely, friendly people. The facility was very clean and the room was nicely put together. My husband and I were paired with another pair of people that had booked the same slot for 'The Kidnapping'. We all worked together well and broke out with 8.5 minutes to spare! I would love to visit again sometime soon and bring some more friends along.

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Baltimore in Baltimore
review: If you like escape rooms you have got to try Breakout games! I was highly impressed by the Kidnapping room! Puzzles and riddles were crafty, props were realistic, and our game master made our experience fun! I can't wait to try the other rooms! Thank you Breakout Games for a unique and awesome way to have fun!

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Baltimore in Baltimore
review: This was a blast! My boyfriend and I went as a two-man team to escape The Kidnapping. The clues were awesome and very well thought out. We had fun working together to solve each puzzle. We didn't get out in time but we were very close! We will definitely try this again!
